translations: （两个及以上）演员或角色退场，下场（剧本中的说明用语）

sentences.sentence: Exeunt BALLS and GORDON, head bowed, to a visiting professorship at MIT.
sentences.translation: 鲍尔斯和戈登退场，谦卑地接见麻省理工学院的教授。

sentences.sentence: Hopefully the powers-that-be will allow us all to exeunt when the time is right.
sentences.translation: 希望如果时间上合适的话，高层会让我们都退场完结本剧。
